metadata.dc:description: There are many clinical types of amyloidosis, as many as chemical types of amyloid substance would be its substratum. This clinic-chemical plurality permits us to talk about the amyloidosis. This article is specially guided to those amyloidosis that present cutaneous damages during its clinical course. They are the immunocytic amyloidosis and the keratinocytic amyloidosis.
metadata.dc:title: Las amiloidosis.
[The amyloidoses].
